Mohamed Mahmoud Ould Louly (; 1 January 1943 â€“ 16 March 2019) was the President of Mauritania and Chairman of the Military Committee for National Salvation (CSMN) from 3 June 1979 to 4 January 1980.Mohamed Mahmoud Ould Louly Britannica.comRFI ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Presidents of Mauritania Category:Mauritanian generals
